name: Abundant Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
When Abundant Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

name: All That Glitters
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
flavor_text: Sooner or later, the House always wins.

name: Ash Barrens
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: War has survivors but rarely has winners.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text:
"New Vegas is more than a city—it's the remedy to mankind's derailment."
—Mr. House

name: Deadly Dispute
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Draw two cards and create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor_text:
"You go break up that bar brawl yet? People are gonna get hurt unless you step in."
—Sheriff Marion

name: Evolving Wilds
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text:
"One day, maybe, kids will play here again."
—Preston Garvey

name: Explorer's Scope
oracle_text:
Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

name: Farseek
oracle_text: Search your library for a Plains, Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Me and Jacob went separate ways after the business with the rig. I went east into the Rockies, looking for other mutants like myself."

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Fertile does not always mean safe.

name: Impassioned Orator
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Come forth and drink the waters of the Glow, for this ancient weapon of war is our salvation. It is the very symbol of Atom's glory!"

name: Mortuary Mire
oracle_text:
Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Mortuary Mire enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.
{T}: Add {B}.
flavor_text: Burying the dead. What an archaic idea.

name: Path of Ancestry
oracle_text:
Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)
flavor_text: "Your mother would have been so proud."

name: Rampant Growth
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Freed from human industry and sheltered from nuclear destruction, Appalachia's plant life finally had a chance to flourish.

name: Razortide Bridge
oracle_text:
Razortide Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
flavor_text: In order to join the Order of the Tadpole, one must pass an athletics test that requires participants to run along the bridge, contending with feral ghouls, bloodbugs, and the bridge's dilapidated state. Don't forget to stretch!

name: Rustvale Bridge
oracle_text:
Rustvale Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
flavor_text:
"The Institute . . . It's important. It really is humanity's best hope for the future, no matter what those above ground might think of us."
—Father

name: Silverbluff Bridge
oracle_text:
Silverbluff Bridge enters the battlefield tapped.
Indestructible
{T}: Add {U} or {R}.
flavor_text: A good way to avoid getting your feet wet (and irradiated) as long as you're willing to contend with raiders, scavengers, and super mutants.

name: Sticky Fingers
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has menace and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token." (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures. The token is an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
When enchanted creature dies, draw a card.

name: Terramorphic Expanse
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A new civilization was built, bit by bit, from the scrap of the old one.

name: Thought Vessel
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: A window into the mind of someone you once knew.

name: Unexpected Windfall
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

name: Wayfarer's Bauble
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: What better way to spend some fun quality time than collecting some snow globes?

name: Wild Growth
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional {G}.
flavor_text:
"Our researchers noted a sense of euphoria and claimed to hear incomprehensible voices. Extreme measures will need to be taken to cull this organism."
—Strangler vine research notes
